subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES, Sept. 17 (AP) — David Wells knows his baseball career is almost over. In fact, Wells said he thought he was finished last month when the San Diego Padres let him go.
snippet: LOS ANGELES, Sept. 17 (AP) — David Wells knows his baseball career is almost over. In fact, Wells said he thought he was finished last month when the San Diego Padres let him go.
